divs: Sighting DetailsWas in 1974, in my father farm, at 22:00h. Me and my family were watching TV, when the energy down. we were outside the house to see what was happening. Then, we saw above the montain, nine kilometers of distance, a strange orange fireball, moving such as a square, I want say, drawning a square. This objetic, stayed there about 30 min and then, disappeared so fast. In this time, the energy returned and the television was OK.I go to the farm ever month, and since this case, I never saw anything.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Santo Antônio de Pádua
This sighting has never been favorited.
